text: Quipaipán was the name of the plains west of Cusco in Peru, famous for the Battle of Quipaipán in 1532 which decided the fate of the Inca Empire. ==References== *Rebecca M. Seaman. Conflict in the Early Americas: An Encyclopedia of the Spanish Empire's Aztec, Incan, and Mayan Conquests ABC- CLIO, Aug 27, 2013 pg. 183 Category:Landforms of Cusco Region Category:Plains of South America
title: Quipaipán
